courses.c_title: 人工智能商業應用系列：企業流程優化實戰I

人工智能(AI)已成為推動企業效率提升和流程優化的核心驅動力，然而如何將AI真正融入企業運作，並發揮其最大價值，仍是許多企業面臨的挑戰。

courses.e_objective:

This course will use practical case studies such as meeting summaries, email assistants, and internal knowledge bases—common scenarios in the corporate world—to help participants quickly understand how to leverage AI tools to reduce costs and improve efficiency for their businesses. courses.e_objective:

It is an important metric for measuring corporate social responsibility performance. As sustainable development becomes a key development goal valued by societies worldwide, finance, investment, and ESG professionals must grasp the fundamental concepts, analytical tools, evaluation criteria of ESG, and their application in investment decision-making.

The ESG Essentials® Certification launched by the European Federation of Financial Analysts Societies (EFFAS) provides basic concepts of ESG for individuals who wish to pursue a career or gain professional knowledge in the ESG field, so that they can provide transparent ESG advice to retail investors. Upon completion of the course, participants will be able to better grasp the key points of each ESG knowledge area of this Certification.
